code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{setIsAuthenticated,setUserRole}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api/admin/users',{auth:{username,password}});setIsAuthenticated(true);const user=response.data.find(u=>u.username===username);setUserRole(user.role);navigate(user.role==='ROOT_ADMIN'?'/admin':'/tables');}catch(error){alert('Đăng nhập thất bại');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl mb-4",children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"T\xEAn ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 mb-4 w-full"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 mb-4 w-full"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full",children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"})]})});}export default Login;
